Installation of the &Sheaves; Package
To install this package just extract the package's archive file to the &GAP; pkg directory.
By default the &Sheaves; package is not automatically loaded by &GAP; when it is installed. You must load the package with
LoadPackage("Sheaves");
before its functions become available.
